headline: Is Schlumberger Limited (SLB) the Best Water Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds?

headline: Should You Invest in Schlumberger Limited (SLB)?
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Focus Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Small cap issues fell in December due to uncertainty and slower Federal Reserve easing, but investors should focus on solid fundamentals as stock prices rise.
